fields.name: General
fields.description: A general announcement with no urgency or severity.  For example, new data was added to a dataset.

fields.name: Warning
fields.description: A warning with no particular urgency.  For example, a minor error in a dataset was discovered and users should update to the new dataset at their convenience.

fields.name: Critical
fields.description: An critical warning that requires action as soon as reasonably possible.  For example, a non-mission critical data point was missing in a dataset.  Any users of the dataset should update to the newest version as soon as reasonably possible.

fields.name: Super Critical
fields.description: A super critical warning that requires immediate action.  For example, a critical error was discovered in a dataset.  Any users of the dataset should cease using it immediately.
